term: You've reached the police non-emergency line
phonetic: UK /ˈyou've ˈreached ˈthe ˈpolice ˈnon-emergency ˈline/

term: I understand I'll dispatch a patrol car

term: Hey there I bought a washing machine
phonetic: UK /ˈhey ˈthere ˈi ˈbought ˈa ˈwashing ˈmachine/
example: _Hey there! I bought a washing machine_ _from you guys_ _a while back_, | _but it's been faulty lately_. | _It always makes a piercing noise_, | _and I've been too scared to use it_ _for a week_.

example: _Yes_, _that's right_. | Because of _low rainfall_, | we need to _conserve water_. | That means there are _certain rules_ about _how and when_ you can _use it at home_.
